message.summary: Legacy library ${issue.args().get(0)} must be installed manually.
description: Stage library ${issue.args().get(0)} has now been moved to legacy stage libraries and can't be installed automatically.

Though we strongly advise using the stage libraries provided with Data Collector, and upgrading related systems, you can continue to use these legacy libraries when necessary. If needed, install the legacy stage library as you install any additional stage library.

message.summary: Try upgrading the Oracle JDBC driver. The installed driver '${context['fileName']}' is no longer actively supported by Oracle.
description: The column ${issue.args().get(0)} is of type TIMESTAMP WITH ${issue.args().get(1) == -102 ? 'LOCAL' : ''} TIME ZONE. Older versions of Oracle JDBC driver are known to have problems with this data type.

Upgrade to the latest the Oracle JDBC driver by replacing the driver loaded from the following location:

${context['jar'][0]}.

Additional JAR files named xdb6.jar and xmlparserv2.jar must be installed separately.
